mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JYUSER(ID, UPWD, NICKNAME, EMAIL) VALUES(#{id}, #{upwd}, #{nickname}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, UPWD, NICKNAME, EMAIL, AUTH FROM JYUSER WHERE ID=#{id} AND UPWD=#{upwd}
SELECT ID, NICKNAME, EMAIL FROM JYUSER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM JYUSER WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE JYUSER SET NICKNAME=#{nickname}, EMAIL=#{email}, UPWD=#{upwd} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, LOCATION, READCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, HATECOUNT, WDATE, UPLOAD, CATID, DEL, IP, REGIONID, COMMENTCOUNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SEQ DESC) AS RNUM, SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, LOCATION, READCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, HATECOUNT, WDATE, UPLOAD, CATID, DEL, IP, REGIONID, NVL(COMMENTCOUNT, 0)COMMENTCOUNT FROM JYBOARD LEFT JOIN (SELECT BOARDSEQ, COUNT(JYCOMMENT.SEQ) AS COMMENTCOUNT FROM JYCOMMENT GROUP BY BOARDSEQ) ON SEQ=BOARDSEQ WHERE ID=#{id} AND DEL=0 ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT NVL(count(*), 0) AS cnt FROM JYBOARD WHERE ID=#{id}
